languages.text: {n}Нестерпимая белизна заливает все вокруг — и вы обнаруживаете себя в кругу раболепствующих прихвостней, трясущихся от одного вашего присутствия. В ваших руках — не жалкий осколок, а великолепное и причудливое оружие, искусный и пугающий своими странными пропорциями и изгибами меч с необычной гардой, украшенной барельефом в виде закрытого глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Нестерпимая белизна заливает все вокруг — и вы обнаруживаете себя в кругу раболепствующих прихвостней, трясущихся от одного вашего присутствия. В ваших руках — не жалкий осколок, а великолепное оружие, искусный и пугающий своими странными пропорциями и изгибами меч с необычной гардой, украшенной барельефом в виде закрытого глаза.{/n}

languages.text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нестерпимая белизна заливает все вокруг — и вы обнаруживаете себя в кругу раболепствующих прихвостней, трясущихся от одного вашего присутствия. В ваших руках — не жалкий осколок, а великолепное и причудливое оружие, искусный и пугающий своими странными пропорциями и изгибами меч с необычной гардой, украшенной барельефом в виде закрытого глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unbearable white shine floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by slavish henchmen shivering in your mere presence. In your hands you hold not a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon, a skilfully crafted sword with frighteningly strange proportions and an unusual guard adorned with a bas-relief in the shape of a closed eye.{/n}

{n}Unbearable white shine floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by slavish henchmen shivering in your mere presence. In your hands you hold not a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon, a skilfully crafted sword with frighteningly strange proportions and an unusual guard adorned with a bas-relief in the shape of a closed eye.{/n}

{n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by slavish minions shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with frighteningly strange proportions and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with frighteningly strange proportions and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

{n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前的一切笼罩在了让人难以直视的强光之中。随后，你发现自己身边跪满了奴颜婢膝的随从，他们在你面前瑟瑟发抖。而你手中握着的，也不再是一块可怜的碎片，而是一把雄伟而复杂的武器。那是一把制作精巧、比例诡异的弧形长剑，剑柄上装饰着一只闭着的眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的一切笼罩在了让人难以直视的强光之中。随后，你发现自己身边跪满了奴颜婢膝的随从，他们在你面前瑟瑟发抖。而你手中握着的，也不再是一块可怜的碎片，而是一把雄伟而复杂的武器。那是一把制作精巧、比例诡异的弧形长剑，剑柄上装饰着一只闭着的眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un éclat de lumière aveuglant inonde la pièce et soudain, vous vous retrouvez {mf|entouré|entourée} de sbires serviles, tremblants de peur à votre simple présence. Vous ne tenez plus un vulgaire fragment d'arme dans votre main, mais une épée majestueuse aux proportions étranges et dérangeantes. Ses décorations sont élaborées et un œil fermé est gravé sur sa poignée à la forme inhabituelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un éclat de lumière aveuglant inonde la pièce et soudain, vous vous retrouvez {mf|entouré|entourée} de sbires serviles, tremblants de peur à votre simple présence. Vous ne tenez plus un vulgaire fragment d'arme dans votre main, mais une épée majestueuse aux proportions étranges et dérangeantes. Ses décorations sont élaborées et un œil fermé est gravé sur sa poignée à la forme inhabituelle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}耐え難いまでに眩い閃光が周囲に溢れる。気が付けばあなたは、、あなたの存在に身を震わせおののく配下の者たちに囲まれていたことのに気付く。あなたの手には、惨めったらしい破片ではなく、荘厳かつ繊細な武器…恐ろしいほどに面妖なプロポーションと、閉じた瞳のイメージを象った柄を備えた、精巧に鍛えられた剣が握られていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}耐え難いまでに眩い閃光が周囲に溢れる。気が付けばあなたは、、あなたの存在に身を震わせおののく配下の者たちに囲まれていたことのに気付く。あなたの手には、惨めったらしい破片ではなく、荘厳かつ繊細な武器…恐ろしいほどに面妖なプロポーションと、閉じた瞳のイメージを象った柄を備えた、精巧に鍛えられた剣が握られていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una luz cegadora lo inunda todo y te encuentras rodead{mf|o|a} de esbirros que se estremecen ante tu presencia. Tus manos ya no empuñan un mísero fragmento, sino un arma majestuosa y adornada: una espada de gran artesanía con proporciones extrañas y perturbadoras, una hoja curva y una empuñadura singular, decorada con un ojo cerrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una luz cegadora lo inunda todo y te encuentras rodead{mf|o|a} de esbirros que se estremecen ante tu presencia. Tus manos ya no empuñan un mísero fragmento, sino un arma majestuosa y adornada: una espada de gran artesanía con proporciones extrañas y perturbadoras, una hoja curva y una empuñadura singular, decorada con un ojo cerrado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein unerträglich helles Licht flutet alles um dich herum, und du bist umgeben von Schergen, deren Leiber angesichts deiner Gegenwart zittern. Du hältst keinen jämmerlichen Splitter mehr in den Händen, sondern eine majestätische Waffe ... ein meisterhaft gefertigtes Schwert mit seltsam verstörenden Proportionen und einem ungewöhnlichen Griff, den das Bild eines geschlossenen Auges ziert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein unerträglich helles Licht flutet alles um dich herum, und du bist umgeben von Schergen, deren Leiber angesichts deiner Gegenwart zittern. Du hältst keinen jämmerlichen Splitter mehr in den Händen, sondern eine majestätische Waffe ... ein meisterhaft gefertigtes Schwert mit seltsam verstörenden Proportionen und einem ungewöhnlichen Griff, den das Bild eines geschlossenen Auges ziert.{/n}

{n}Ein unerträglich helles Licht flutet alles um dich herum, und du bist umgeben von sklavischen Schergen, die ob deiner bloßen Anwesenheit zittern. Du hältst keinen jämmerlichen Splitter mehr in den Händen, sondern eine majestätische Waffe — ein meisterhaft gefertigtes Schwert von furchterregend seltsamen Proportionen und mit einem ungewöhnlichen Griff, der mit dem Bild eines geschlossenen Auges verziert ist.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: Вспышка — игрок стоит с готовым хаос-мечом в руках, призраки вокруг — на коленях или поклоняются

languages.text: {n}Dayanılmaz derecede parlak bir ışık, etraftaki her şeyi kaplıyor. Varlığının bedenlerini titretmeye yettiği, sürünen kölelerce etrafın sarılıyor. Ellerinde artık o zavallı parçayı değil, görkemli ve anlaşılmaz bir silahı tutuyor. Bu silah; rahatsız edici gariplikte bir boyuta, kavisli bir tasarıma ve kapalı bir göz imgesiyle süslü, alışılmadık bir kabzaya sahip, ustalıkla üretilmiş bir kılıç.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An unbearably bright light floods everything around, and you find yourself surrounded by grovelling minions, their bodies shivering in your mere presence. Your hands no longer hold a pitiful shard, but a majestic and intricate weapon — a skilfully crafted sword with strange, unnerving proportions, a curved design, and an unusual hilt adorned with the image of a closed eye.{/n}
